Entry.JapaneseText: あのスージーって子、ずいぶんおびえてたね。 服も汚れてたし……
Entry.EnglishText: That Suzy was so scared... And her clothes were all dirty...

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、いくら女王の命令でも、 やっていい事と悪い事がある！
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, even if it was on the Queen's orders, there are things that you should and shouldn't do!

Entry.JapaneseText: 姉貴やクレアさんが、あんな目に あってなきゃいいけどな……
Entry.EnglishText: I hope something like that doesn't happen to Selena or Claire...

Entry.JapaneseText: とにかく、女王め！ 会ったら、絶対ぶん殴ってやる!!
Entry.EnglishText: Well, screw the Queen! When we meet, I'm gonna give her a good thrashing!
